Function reference

Adjusted Predictions for Regression Models

ggeffect() ggemmeans() ggpredict() as.data.frame(<ggeffects>)
Marginal effects, adjusted predictions and estimated marginal means from regression models
pool_predictions()
Pool Predictions or Estimated Marginal Means

Pairwise Comparisons and Contrasts

hypothesis_test()
(Pairwise) comparisons between predictions

Plotting Adjusted Predictions

plot(<ggeffects>) theme_ggeffects() show_pals()
Plot ggeffects-objects

Plot Annotation from Labelled Data

get_title() get_x_title() get_y_title() get_legend_title() get_legend_labels() get_x_labels() get_complete_df()
Get titles and labels from data

Utilities

collapse_by_group()
Collapse raw data by random effect groups
install_latest()
Update latest ggeffects-version from R-universe (GitHub) or CRAN
new_data() data_grid()
Create a data frame from all combinations of predictor values
pretty_range()
Create a pretty sequence over a range of a vector
residualize_over_grid()
Compute partial residuals from a data grid
values_at() representative_values()
Calculate representative values of a vector
vcov(<ggeffects>)
Calculate variance-covariance matrix for marginal effects

Sample Data Sets

efc efc_test
Sample dataset from the EUROFAMCARE project
fish
Sample data set
lung2
Sample data set
